nodes.text: The spotted jugadoo was a species of multicolored elephantine creatures native to the Dandelo system. In the early days of the Galactic Empire, a rare spotted jugadoo was hunted down by Starhunter's Intergalactic Menagerie, but was freed by C-3PO, R2-D2, and Jann Tosh. The mostly red creature mistook C-3PO for a potential mate when the protocol droid tried to mimic its vocalizations in a ruse to protect his friends.
